title: How to pick a IT Asset Management Solution - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, There are a number of parameters which will define your selection. Some of the typical top key requirements are; Asset Discovery - It is good to use agent and agentless asset discovery tools if you have a large IT network. FYI - Asset or Network discovery is fundamental to most business - you can control malware, phishing, P2P risks effectively with a good discovery tool.IT Asset Management Functionalities - They can include anything from installation, usage, procurement and disposal of your IT Assets. Only you can define what is right for you - most providers have all the required functionalities, the depth of the functionalities will definately vary amongst vendors. So this area can only be evaluated after looking at product demosITSM or IT Service Management - This is a key area to service your internal and external customers - From Incident Management to Service Level Agreements there are a number of functionalities, same as above - most vendors have all the functionalities, the depth certainly will vary.Most businesses choose an IT Asset Management Software based on the above wide parameters (within each of the above, there a number of options available which you can define and control). If required, You can shortlist and compare IT Asset Management Software options on comparesoft.com  I hope this was useful, please let me know if you have any specific follow-up queries.
